Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.locating

Class SmartFinder

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.locating.SmartFinder
public final class SmartFinder extends Object
Utility class for finding elements in the DOM, including support for Shadow DOM elements.

This class provides methods to locate elements normally and within Shadow DOMs, handling different WebDriver configurations.

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
